website_summaries.verdict: A popular mascara by Urban Decay for good reason: it works as promised for most who try it, making lashes pop without unsightly clumps.
pros: Offers highly pigmented color for black, bold lashes
Makes lashes look longer and thicker without clumping
Contains ingredients that strengthen lashes and stimulate hair follicles
Consistency is just right – not too thick, wet, or dry
Brush is fluffy and easy to control
cons: Slightly sticky and may smudge throughout the day on some wearers
Takes several coats to build coverage

customer_reviews.title: Be Aware Trial Size NOT Full Size
customer_reviews.text: Just be aware this is not a full size mascara but a very small trial size! The fact that it's a trial size is not communicated in the listing. Given the price (actually the full size product is available for less money), one would expect a full size product. I'm disappointed in Amazon for stocking this item and allowing this to happen
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Yates

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT a full size tube
customer_reviews.text: I love Perversion Mascara but I will NEVER buy it from Amazon again. I received the 4.0 oz size or travel size. I thought I was getting a full size tube. Paying $30 for a travel size is absolutely ridiculous. I know buyer beware but I had bought this mascara from Amazon before and got both the full size and travel size for $47.00. Shame on me for thinking that it would be a full size tube for $30. What a ripoff.
customer_reviews.author: Coolmeemaw

customer_reviews.title: Unpackaged; looks like a display item.
customer_reviews.text: I love this brand mascara, but this time I ordered from a different seller and the mascara came unpackaged with a tacky worn out sticker saying “new item” on it.. Usually, and always, when you buy from a store, it comes with the urban decay purple box packaging, and you can trust that the product is new. Now I’m hesitant to apply the mascara...I don’t want an eye infection and I’m wondering how old this is. The mascara and the brush look ok and not dried out but the label saying “new item” itself was worn-almost like it was a display item.
customer_reviews.author: Claudine

customer_reviews.title: Feel Cheated
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered this product before and received the full-size version of the mascara and loved it! When I ran out, I reordered the same item and what came looks like a sample size compared to my first purchase. Very disappointed and feel scammed.
customer_reviews.author: Lara

customer_reviews.title: Not the real thing!
customer_reviews.text: This formula is ok, but this is NOT the real perversion mascara from Urban Decay... I have been using this mascara for years, and I always buy the travel size. My first time buying it off Amazon, and unfortunately it’s not the real thing, I added pictures from 2 travel size mascaras I had that are almost empty. I bought from Ulta at 13$ a piece. Totally different... clearly... not real don’t buy!
customer_reviews.author: Kristen devries

customer_reviews.title: Not a good deal
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was as shown in the picture,the big mascara. It's the travel size with the price of the big one. Im.not sure where they store it but it was dry, as if it were not brand new. I typically buy it at Sephora but because I was already shopping on Amazon I decided to get it here. Would not order it again.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Empty tube and open box! Waste of money!
customer_reviews.text: Package was open and has little to NO mascara in it. $40 gone! Horrible
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: could be counterfeit product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the mascara and it came in a box built for primer and mascara with 2 slots. The box also says it is for the primer and mascara duo. There are also differences on the bottle from a store-bought version of the mascara I bought.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy arrington

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this mascara. I have tried MANY others without success. I discovered this about 8 years ago and won't use anything else. I'm blessed with long lashes but they are sparse. This makes them VOLUMINOUS! One coat will do you but for a more dramatic effect, you can layer it on. It doesn't clump or smudge and lasts all day. One tube goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly S.

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: I am nuts about mascara. This was a disappointment. After applying as I usually do, I found my lashes to be darker, but not longer or thicker. I won't buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing-seemingly old product
customer_reviews.text: I literally just got this mascara a month ago and it’s already dried up as if I had it for a year. Usually when I buy this from Sephora it can last me six months and still be in perfect condition, nice and wet and like new. It was like I bought an old mascara. I would really like somebody to make good on this purchase. I paid over $20 for this and it did not even last me 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Ocasio

customer_reviews.title: CANNOT BE BEATEN
customer_reviews.text: At 58 years old, I've probably tried 50 different brands of mascara, including Too Faced, Kat Von D, Mary Kay, Clinique included.. I can without hesitation say that Perversion mascara cannot be beaten. For the first time in 30 years I'm getting bottom lash definition and not just a black smudge across my lower eye lid. Way to go Urban Decay
customer_reviews.author: LeAnnRobertson

customer_reviews.title: Adds length, doesn't clump
customer_reviews.text: This mascara makes my lashes look longer. There's (almost) no clumping. I love that the tube is so small--it will be great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Ondrejka

customer_reviews.title: Great Mascara
customer_reviews.text: I have been trying out different mascaras and this was one of the best I've used. Makes your lashes look long without clumping them together like other products. You should try this product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: waste of money
customer_reviews.text: received a mini tube instead of the full size even though i paid the price of a full size. and the tube barely even has any mascara left in it. box looked like it had been used.
customer_reviews.author: Paige O

customer_reviews.title: Possibly a fake
customer_reviews.text: This is not at all like the Perversion I’ve purchased at Ulta. Runny, floppy and chunky. I’m thinking counterfeit.
customer_reviews.author: Trisha Roberson

customer_reviews.title: Older eyes
customer_reviews.text: I am in my sixties and have been using this for some years now. Definitely my favorite mascara. No clumping and more natural looking eyelashes with this. It is more expensive but I find it lasts a long time.
customer_reviews.author: G. Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive to eyes
customer_reviews.text: I can't wear a lot of make up due to reaction. This product is one I can wear with no problem!
customer_reviews.author: LL

customer_reviews.title: Build able, wearable, flake free
customer_reviews.text: One of my favorite mascaras. Goes on well very buildable great value for the size of product. Wear lasts all day without flaking.
customer_reviews.author: lillms.sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Great product but clumpy after 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Goes on great. My three stars is because it dried out pretty quick. (3 weeks). Still usable but a little clumpy. I would buy the smaller ones next time.
customer_reviews.author: eve skelton

customer_reviews.title: This Mascara is amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love how much volume and length this mascara adds to my lashes!
customer_reviews.author: April Langston

customer_reviews.title: Runs
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like it. It melted under my eyes within an hour of application. Also, it took me a few days to completely clean it off with soap and water. I’m underwhelmed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love this brand but this was a fake
customer_reviews.text: This isn’t the actual formula. The wand is right but it’s sticky and junk. I threw it away
customer_reviews.author: Lyss

customer_reviews.title: Wife said amazing
customer_reviews.text: She loved it perfect mascara you said take a while to get the flash brush full of product but once they got going perfect
customer_reviews.author: Hub

customer_reviews.title: Deceptive advertisement
customer_reviews.text: I paid $24.99 for this product and recieved a sample size. Please don’t get snookered like I did.
customer_reviews.author: Angie C.

customer_reviews.title: FAKE FAKE FAKE
customer_reviews.text: Complete crap and completely unsatisfied! Paid for a full size... got a travel size. DO NOT PURCHASE FROM HERE!! Can’t give a ZERO star, but that’s what they deserve.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gaborko

customer_reviews.title: Faulse advertising
customer_reviews.text: This advertised a full size mascara. Instead I recieved a travel size that cost me $30.
customer_reviews.author: BSquare

customer_reviews.title: Came as a trail size
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, and I had ordered here before, but my last shipment came as a trail size. So the one star is because I was sent the small size the 2nd time 😒
customer_reviews.author: Cory Stuart

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: For almost $40 i got a tester!!! Omg i could have gotten a huge one at Ulta or other makeup stores for same price. It also feels dry like its been used. Don’t trust this. I’m so angry.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this mascara. This is a large size and the brush is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: michelle Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Was sent trial size. Paid for full size.
customer_reviews.text: Shipper sent a trial size not full product size. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Julie A Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Amazing lashes!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome mascara for volume and length. I am def purchasing again!
customer_reviews.author: Shar

customer_reviews.title: This is a mini sample tube of mascara
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara, but this is just a 4 fl oz travel tube. Definitely not worth $25.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Best Mascara!
customer_reviews.text: I love this mascara. I used to purchase Chanel mascara and, this is the best mascara I've ever used. I've been using this product now for about 3 years! Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn A. Bedbury

customer_reviews.title: Go to the brick and mortar store .
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was purchasing a regular size mascara. This product is a sample size. For $16.00 I feel my value for money spent is very low. I am very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda A. McGillen

customer_reviews.title: Same price, less product.
customer_reviews.text: Mascara is wonderful. Ordering from here, not so much. I’ve ordered it twice with no issue but this time I hit “buy again” only to receive a miniature version- at the same cost.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Monju

customer_reviews.title: Beware trial size at price of full size!
customer_reviews.text: I like the product but it was a trial size at the price of a full size tube.
customer_reviews.author: E. Fish

customer_reviews.title: Love this mascara!1
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. My eyes are really sensitive to makeup. Finally found one that does not irritate them
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They really think they are slick!
customer_reviews.text: They thought they were slick sending me this tiny a$$ bottle. I returned it because I'm not paying $24 for a sample size!
customer_reviews.author: Idella M.

customer_reviews.title: Movie Star lashes
customer_reviews.text: Gives great thickness and volume without clumping. Absolutely love it! Gives me movie star lashes.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Travel Size
customer_reviews.text: Paid for full size and received trial size. Rip off
customer_reviews.author: Micaelah95

customer_reviews.title: Product shelf life old
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product and have used it before...I feel it was old because I have been having trouble with my eyes hurting and itching after I use it for a day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It runs easily
customer_reviews.text: Love the deep deep black color. Not waterproof, and raccoons the eyes quickly. Will only order again waterproof to give it another try.
customer_reviews.author: Toni Brandon

customer_reviews.title: False advertising product was sample size!
customer_reviews.text: Product was sample size!!! I paid $34.00 what a joke! Horrible
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: It is clumpy
customer_reviews.text: It is very clumpy. My eyelashes fall out when use the makeup remover. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Draws

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay on
customer_reviews.text: Not very thick and runs onto my eyes. Not a fan. Replacement suggestions?
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany Wood

customer_reviews.title: Melts under my eyes
customer_reviews.text: I wouldn’t buy again. This mascara melts under my eyes within a few hours of wear.
customer_reviews.author: Cambria

customer_reviews.title: Good Mascara, Not Good Buying Here
customer_reviews.text: First time I purchased I received the regular size. Went and hit buy again and received the mini travel size and paid the same cost as the first time!
customer_reviews.author: Amy Meifert

customer_reviews.title: Great Mascara
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for several years. Still love it. Delivered next day. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Diane Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Best ever
customer_reviews.text: No longer need to spend $ on lash extensions best I have ever had
customer_reviews.author: deborah k sargent

customer_reviews.title: Thick and full
customer_reviews.text: Does an amazing job making lashes look big and full without looking clumpy.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyg

customer_reviews.title: It really adds length
customer_reviews.text: Best mascara I have tried yet! And I have tried a few.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Strengths: volumizing definition and lash curl without feeling heavy Weaknesses: very smudgy, difficult to remove I’m not sure I would spend this much for this mascara again. It’s better than most drugstore brands I’ve used, but if I were to go to a sad movie or work out or even just hang out next to the bathtub while bathing my kids, I would start looking like a raccoon. I have been seeing it smudge slightly even just from daily wear. If I’m going to pay that much for mascara, I’ll go back to using Thrive, which doesn’t smudge and comes off with warm water.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Nordin

customer_reviews.title: RIP OFF!!
customer_reviews.text: Awful! This is a travel size mascara. It does not say that anywhere on the listing. The box was tampered with and I would definitely NOT shave paid over 30 dollars for a small travel mascara! Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: melinda m mariano

customer_reviews.title: Miniature product for nont miniature price
customer_reviews.text: Read the small print on this one! I love this brand and thought it was a bargain without noticing the size!!! That's what I get for not paying attention...NOT a bargain. I feel ripped off.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best mascara
customer_reviews.text: This is the best mascara/eyeliner I’ve ever used! I will never go back to my previous brand. The applicator brush makes my eyelashes look full and long. Lasts all day. Does not smudge. Washes off easily with makeup remover wipes.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Sherrill

customer_reviews.title: OPEN BOX
customer_reviews.text: This mascara is amazing, but arrived unboxed and appeared to be used.
customer_reviews.author: spnyc

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This is a favorite for sure. I like to use the primer underneath for full effect.
customer_reviews.author: G

customer_reviews.title: Not Full Size!!!
customer_reviews.text: Paid a full size price and receive a sample size!! What a ripoff!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tony F.

customer_reviews.title: Empty package
customer_reviews.text: My bag was completely empty! Just an empty bag with no product to be seen! I need my money back!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Krason

customer_reviews.title: The best mascara I’ve ever purchased.
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing mascara. It thickens and lengthens really well. I’ll be buying this’s again.
customer_reviews.author: Betsy

product_meta.title: Perversion Mascara Bigger Blacker Badder
product_meta.description: For lashings of sex appeal and high voltage drama, introduce Perversion Mascara into your make up bag. Our ultra-creamy, lengthening, volumizing formula coats each lash with triple-black pigments and a deeply nourishing ingredient blend. Build, separate and define lashes with the purest, most intense black pigments for bigger, blacker, badder lashes. Not too wet and not too dry, Perversion Mascara glides effortlessly through lashes, coating them in creamy, full bodied texture. Build up coats of super black volume for a glamorous wide-eye effect. The days of clumpy, brittle lashes are long gone. Urban Decay volumising mascara will have you hooked with its high tech brush, which defines and separates as it glides through lashes. It gives you the control to build a bespoke eye look. Perversion gives you high-volume, high- drama lashes with the sheen of shiny latex and the va-va-voom of falsies. For even sexier lashes, prep yours with Subversion Lash Primer before applying Perversion Mascara. Perversion Mascara features our high-tech, volumizing brush. What makes it different from other mascara brushes? The twisted trim on the brush latches on to each lash to separate and define; finally, a volumizing mascara with a clean, clump-free finish. Our brush pulls through lashes smoothly and lays down a generous amount of product. No need to wiggle the wand or maneuver it at all different angles! And if you need to apply in public, youll look good holding Perversion. We emblazoned our gorgeous, highly metallized black tube with a big purple Perversion and our tagline: Bigger. Blacker. Badder. Perversion Mascara contains Hairdensyl, a complex blend of proteins and amino acidsincluding marine glycogen, known to stimulate lash growth. Honey extract provides deep nourishment, sea idrolized elastine stimulates the hair follicle, and marine collagen protects. Frame eyes and revolutionise your lashes with a look that's bigger, blacker and badder.
feature_bullets: Get bigger, blacker, badder lashes with our ultra-creamy, lengthening and volumizing mascara.
Perversion has a creamy, full-bodied texture that’s not too dry, not too wet. This allows just the right amount of “pull” so it glides through lashes.
The twisted trim on the high-tech, volumizing brush latches on to each lash to separate and define; finally, a volumizing mascara with a clean, clump-free finish.
